title: Secure Internet - Enabled File Transfer Software
text: Questions Business Summary This software company is based in north Texas. Their software includes an internet-enabled, secure managed file transfer application that runs on multiple platforms, including Windows, UNIX, Linux, OSX and HP NonStop. Their products move data from point A to point B securely, in an automated manner, and without risk of interceptions and security breaches. This software is vitally important and deeply embedded within the customer's file delivery processes, sending and receiving thousands of files to and from their business partners on a daily basis. All of their products are innovative, viable, and current. Their customers include big name entities that have annually renewable contracts, making the company self-sustaining. This company's mission is to provide excellent support to every customer, ensuring business continuity with their trading partners resulting in total satisfaction of the products. This software company has been in business since 2000 with the current ownership. After years of hard work and dedication building this business, the current owners have decided to let a new owner take it to the next level. This Texas based business is a great opportunity to take a business that is already successful and build on that foundation to secure your future. This company could be operated in a hands-on or absentee fashion, giving the owner the ability to enjoy a flexible schedule and as much control of business activities as desired. This company offers a new owner a profitable business with stable revenues. Equipment and inventory included in the sale, more details available upon inquiry. This business currently has 3,600 sq ft of space on the second floor of an office building. They moved into this location four years ago with a total customized build out. Location is leased and could be relocated after negotiating the lease termination and staff relocation. Asking $3,199,000. 95% repeat clientele. Financials
